Flow.description: Flow to move animals between locations. Creates Movement records and updates various statuses
Flow.label: Animal - Movement Process

recordLookups.description: Gets all current movement records based on the animals Id
recordLookups.name: Get_All_Movement_Records_by_Animal_ID
recordLookups.label: Get All Movement Records by Animal ID

recordUpdates.description: Clears the current flag on current movement record and sets End Date to today
recordUpdates.name: Clear_Current_Movement_Record
recordUpdates.label: Clear Current Movement Record

fields.name: Animal_Has_Existing_Location_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText:
{!Get_Animals_Details.%%%NAMESPACED_ORG%%%Animal_Name__c} already has a current location


{!Get_Current_Movement_and_Location_Record_ID.%%%NAMESPACED_ORG%%%Location_Name__c}


To leave the animal in its current location, exit here, or continue to assign a new location

fields.name: Boarder_Selection_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText: Select a Unit where the animal will be boarded

fields.name: Error_Movement_Records_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText:
OOPS!


It appears this animal seems to be in multiple locations at once, and has multiple movement records that are marked as current.


Please check the movement records for this animal, resolve this issue and try again.

fields.name: Error_Text
fields.fieldText:
Oh no! There has been an error!


Try and use the previous button below to go back a step and try again. If the problem persists please take a note of the fault message below and send it to your Salesforce Administrator or Salesforce Support.


Fault Message:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Error_Text_2
fields.fieldText:
Oh no! There has been an error!


Try and use the previous button below to go back a step and try again. If the problem persists please take a note of the fault message below and send it to your Salesforce Administrator or Salesforce Support.


Fault Message:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Foster_Selection_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText: Choose a Foster from the selection below

fields.name: Screen_TypeOfMovement_Info
fields.fieldText:
Type of Movement

Select a type from the picklist below.

fields.name: Screen_Generate_Tasks_Information
fields.fieldText:
Generate Salesforce Tasks

If you would like to generate Salesforce Tasks for this schedule, please toggle the option below to on.

fields.name: Movement_Complete_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText:
Records Updated!


The location for {!Get_Animals_Details.%%%NAMESPACED_ORG%%%Animal_Name__c} has now been updated.


Please click Finish to complete the wizard.

fields.name: Organisation_Selection_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText: Choose an Organisation from the selection below

fields.name: Unit_Selection_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText: Select a Unit where the animal will be housed
